description: Gets detailed information about the specified license configuration.

parameters.name: LicenseConfigurationArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: LicenseConfigurationId
nested_items.description: Unique ID for the license configuration.

nested_items.name: LicenseConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: LicenseCountingType
nested_items.description: Dimension for which the licenses are counted.

nested_items.name: LicenseRules
nested_items.description: License rules.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LicenseCount
nested_items.description: Number of available licenses.

nested_items.name: LicenseCountHardLimit
nested_items.description: Sets the number of available licenses as a hard limit.

nested_items.name: ConsumedLicenses
nested_items.description: Number of licenses assigned to resources.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: License configuration status.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: Account ID of the owner of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: ConsumedLicenseSummaryList
nested_items.description: Summaries of the licenses consumed by resources.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Resource type of the resource consuming a license.

nested_items.name: ConsumedLicenses
nested_items.description: Number of licenses consumed by the resource.

nested_items.name: ManagedResourceSummaryList
nested_items.description: Summaries of the managed resources.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Type of resource associated with a license.

nested_items.name: AssociationCount
nested_items.description: Number of resources associated with licenses.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Tags for the license configuration.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Tag value.

nested_items.name: ProductInformationList
nested_items.description: Product information.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Resource type. The possible values are SSM_MANAGED | RDS.

nested_items.name: ProductInformationFilterList
nested_items.description: A Product information filter consists of a ProductInformationFilterComparator which is a logical operator, a ProductInformationFilterName which specifies the type of filter being declared, and a ProductInformationFilterValue that specifies the value to filter on.
Application Name - The name of the application. Logical operator is EQUALS.
Application Publisher - The publisher of the application. Logical operator is EQUALS.
Application Version - The version of the application. Logical operator is EQUALS.
Platform Name - The name of the platform. Logical operator is EQUALS.
Platform Type - The platform type. Logical operator is EQUALS.

Tag:key - The key of a tag attached to an Amazon Web Services resource you wish to exclude from automated discovery. Logical operator is NOT_EQUALS. The key for your tag must be appended to Tag: following the example: Tag:name-of-your-key. ProductInformationFilterValue is optional if you are not using values for the key.
AccountId - The 12-digit ID of an Amazon Web Services account you wish to exclude from automated discovery. Logical operator is NOT_EQUALS.

License Included - The type of license included. Logical operators are EQUALS and NOT_EQUALS. Possible values are: sql-server-enterprise | sql-server-standard | sql-server-web | windows-server-datacenter.

nested_items.name: AutomatedDiscoveryInformation
nested_items.description: Automated discovery information.

nested_items.name: LastRunTime
nested_items.description: Time that automated discovery last ran.

nested_items.name: DisassociateWhenNotFound
nested_items.description: When true, disassociates a resource when software is uninstalled.
